mcq.q: Which of the following is NOT a principle behind transport layer services?
The Internet transport protocol that provides connectionless transport is called _______.
The Internet transport protocol that provides connection-oriented reliable transport is called _______.
The transport layer provides logical communication between _______ running on different hosts.
On the sender side, the transport layer breaks application messages into _______.
On the receiver side, the transport layer _______ segments back into messages.
The network layer provides communication between _______.
In the 'household analogy', hosts are equivalent to _______.
In the 'household analogy', processes are equivalent to _______.
The receiver's transport layer receives a segment from the _______ layer.
The process of passing a received message up to the correct application via a socket is called _______.
Which protocol provides reliable, in-order delivery?
Which protocol provides unreliable, unordered delivery?
Which of the following is NOT a feature of TCP?
UDP is described as a no-frills extension of _______.
Which of these services is NOT available from Internet transport protocols?

tf.q: UDP is a connection-oriented transport protocol.
The transport layer provides logical communication between hosts.
tf.correction: It provides logical communication between application processes.

tf.q: The sender's transport layer breaks application messages into segments.
The network layer provides communication between processes.
The transport layer relies on and enhances network layer services.
The sender's transport layer passes a created segment directly to the Link layer.
tf.correction: It passes the segment to IP (the network layer).

tf.q: The receiver's transport layer receives segments from the IP layer.
TCP provides congestion control and flow control.

tf.correction: It is a 'no-frills' protocol; TCP provides congestion control.

tf.q: Internet transport protocols like TCP and UDP offer bandwidth guarantees.
tf.correction: This service is not available from them.
